meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Aurora Nibley Steve Stoffle Gwen Niksic Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7260.

td.p: Aurora Nibley, a tour guide from Valley Village, California
Steve Stoffle, a leadership trainer from Decatur, Georgia
Gwen Niksic, a major account manager originally from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,000)

tr.td: LET'S RIDE THE WHEEL!
BRITISH HISTORY
POLITICAL SHORTHAND
ANAGRAMS
BOOKS FOR YOUNG READERS
HITT"ING" THE TOP 40

Gwen
Steve
Aurora

2nd place: $2,000

(including 3 DDs),
